hero.title:
Redesigning Alignment.
Transforming the Future of Manufacturing.
hero.subtitle:
BalanceStage QuadAlign X is the world's first high-load alignment platform unifying four axes (X, Y, Pitch, Roll) in a single control.

Alignment is no longer for experts ‚Äî with one command, anyone can achieve precision.

problemSolution.title:
Conventional alignment was complex.
We redesigned it as a platform.
problemSolution.description: The greatest challenge in precision manufacturing is angle alignment (Pitch/Roll) under high loads. Traditional methods relied on manual work and complex controls.
problemSolution.subtitle: QuadAlign X synchronizes four axes on a single platform, redefining alignment through real-time correction.

features.title: Not added, but unified
features.subtitle: Transforming alignment complexity into one simple control

roadmap.title: From Two Axes to a New Standard in Alignment Control
roadmap.content: QuadAlign X is not a two-axis extension. Centered on Pitch and Roll, it revolutionizes control with real-time multi-axis compensation. BlueRobot is evolving this into a six-axis intelligent alignment system.
roadmap.vision: Alignment is no longer about matching points ‚Äî it must become the technology that redesigns the process.
